physical_appearance: "This is a batik tablecloth. It features characters from the fairytale ""Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs"". A portrait of snow white is depicted in the center of the tablecloth
subject_terms_1: with the seven dwarfs surrounding her in a circle within a medallion. Clumps of mushrooms decorate the outer border of the medallion. The background of the medallion is pink depictions (visual works) fairy tales
subject_terms_2: while the exterior is set against a darker shade." Peranakan (Asian people) Snow White (tale) Fairy tales Tablecloths
